room_title: Escape room "Traumatized" by Legendary Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: I did the Traumatized room with my boyfriend and three other people. I feel this was a good number of people for this room. The decor and design made you feel very immersed in the story. The room had a good "scare factor".We had a person in the room who was not an actor to direct us in case we got off track or so that we would not break anything. I personally feel that takes away from the experience. This room does have a lot of puzzles that went well with the decor and design of the room. Unfortunately, I have done most of them in other escape rooms. The room had some cool props but I felt the puzzles were a bit time consuming and lacking in creativity.I feel this is a great room for newbies.

room_title: Escape room "Traumatized" by Legendary Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: My wife and I did the escape rooms, the way they make you feel like your in the story. The rooms were very detail to trap you in that story they create. LOVE IT!

room_title: Escape room "Traumatized" by Legendary Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: Great time! We did Traumatized with a group of 10 and it was a blast! Highly recommend
